授業目的: Students will learn how the article is organized to find a main idea, and how the main idea is supported by surrounding sentences/passages. To read without depending on Japanese translation.
到達目標:
At the end of the semester, students will acquire the following skills.
1. Through intensive reading, students will improve basic reading comprehension skills required to understand descriptive, reasoning and problem-solving passages.
2. Vocabulary building by learning words and expressions used in the textbook and sub-text.
3. Extensive reading is meant for fluency reading. Graded Readers books are used (however, if the class is switched to online, your teacher will provide different materials for extensive reading).
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.

トピック.授業計画1:
The detailed Course Outline including weekly activities and assessments will be proved at the beginning of the semester. Basically, students will go through the following activities.
1. Weekly reading practice and vocabulary learning by using the textbook.
2. Extensive reading (outside class) 5 times per semester (online learning may have a different way. Please follow your teacher’s instruction).
3. Occasional vocabulary tests, and two examinations during the semester.
4. Occasional homework to be brought into class in the following week (this does not apply to online learning. Weekly activities should be followed).
トピック.授業外学習2:
1. Students are requested to prepare for each lesson as instructed in the Course Outline.
2. Students are requested to read 5 Graded Readers books, and submit their reports (or equivalent reading in the case of online learning)
